settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Adjust eCube preferences, thresholds, and regional options.
settings.placeholder: This area will let you tweak system-wide eCube settings like safety thresholds, time zone, and display units.
settings.placeholderDetail: Once EnergyBridge APIs are wired, you'll be able to save changes and sync them to the controller.

developer.title: Developer tools
developer.description: Low-level tools for inspecting logs, events, and diagnostics.

logs.title: Logs
logs.body: View and filter system logs to trace behaviors and diagnose issues.

events.title: Events
events.body: Inspect recent system events, BMS signals, and control actions.

devices.title: Devices
devices.description: Manage and monitor all connected devices in your energy system

details.title: Device Details
details.placeholder: Detailed device information and controls will be available once the EnergyBridge API is integrated.
